General.Name: Santech Holdings Limited
General.Description: Santech Holdings Limited operates as a consumer-focused technology company. It explores opportunities in consumer technology, consumer healthcare, and enterprise technology. The company was formerly known as Hywin Holdings Ltd. and changed its name to Santech Holdings Limited in July 2024. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Shanghai, the People's Republic of China.
General.Address: F3, 8 Yincheng Mid. Road, Shanghai, China, 200120
